de.polygonal.ds.Visitable

type
interface

An object that can be visited in a traversal.

Instance Methods

visit(preflight : Bool, userData : Dynamic) : Bool

parameters
preflight if true, an extra traversal is performed before the actual traversal runs.
The first pass visits all elements and calls element.visit() with the preflight parameter set to true. In this pass the return value determines whether the element (and all its children (tree) or neighbors (graph)) will be processed (true) or excluded (false) from the final traversal, which is the second pass (preflight parameter set to false).
userData custom data passed to every visited element. Default is null.
